title: OTTIya kuranginai
sahitya:
OTTiya kuranginai uLLE azhaippArO OhO maDa nenjamE


anupallavi

  vITTinirp-pughundadan cETTaigaL pOdAvO vIdi shaniyanai sAdam pOTTazhaippArO


caraNam    muLLinai malarenru muttam koDuppArO muTTikkAl kazhudaiyaip-paTTattil vaippArO
kaLLap-puruSan kannikAdAnam sheivAnO kaNDAlE teriyAdO karuk-kurangin kathai
